nodes.bodyText: if there is a race between 2 RPC calls for export and the tempDir, this would fail right? May be we need to add a random suffix with directory name?
No it won't. The DirUtils.mkdirs handle concurrent calls. We just need one tmp directory and have temp file (random name) created under it.
should the file name also have random string included just in case? although if we have unique directory than that should solve it.
this is the file name as we provided for the browser (if someone hit the API through browser). It doesn't affect command line.
We could, however, add a timestamp to it.
